amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Veterans Health Administration medical care by $20 million and medical and prosthetic research by $20 million; and deletes funding for the Corporation for National and Community Service.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 as printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate funding for Americorps which receives #367 million under the bill. The amendment would then transfer $20 million to Veterans Health Administration Medical Care, $20 million to VA medical and prosthetic research, and the remaining $327 million toward deficit reduction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tiahrt amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
